channel.title: Invalid address on compile
channel.description:
I get this error whenever I try to compile. All paths are valid. I remember getting this kind of error. Everything was fine a few days ago and I didn't move any file. runtime freshly re-copied. Any clue? Thanks
"translation: invalid address access"
! C:\Users\x173\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.h.gch internal error in mingw32_gt_pch_use_address, at config/i386/host-mingw32.c:190: MapViewOfFileEx: Tentative d’accès à une adresse non valide.
make: *** [C:\Users\x173\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.bin] Error 1 shell task failed, exit value: 1 Compiling patch failed ( C:\Users\x173\Documents\axoloti\axoloti-factory\patches\demos\synth\dreamy.axp ) Saving preferences... preferences path : C:\Users\x173\Documents\axoloti\axoloti.prefs

item.title: Invalid address on compile
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

See this

Mingw32 error ive not seen, Axoloti wont compile [solved] Helpdesk
Hi there, so yeah basically last night was doing some work with the axo and everything was good. Then i got back home from uni and went to boot up the axo again and i get this odd error. Nothing has changed in terms of the patch as i just loaded my save from earlier in the day. i have also tried just loading a single factory object into the patcher and still the axo wont compile and brings up same error :frowning: .[image] Any ideas as to what this means/how can i fix ? some more info, ive…

Read full topic

item.title: Invalid address on compile
item.dc:creator: @kx3
item.description:
@kx3 wrote:

I get this error whenever I try to compile. All paths are valid. I remember getting this kind of error.
Everything was fine a few days ago and I didn't move any file. runtime freshly re-copied. Any clue? Thanks

internal error in mingw32_gt_pch_use_address, at config/i386/host-mingw32.c:190: MapViewOfFileEx: Tentative d’accès à une adresse non valide.
